> [akito](#comment_379_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): @zerocateu "A: NEVER use Coinhive.js without asking for permission from the user first. After all, websites always request permission to activate Webcam, microphone, etc." Does not work in Tor Browser.

I should add that Coinhive should be confined to the Clearnet. I don't recommend running a miner on a Zite .. Zites are more like a fragment of internet history, a way of ensuring the immortality of your content.. but ultimately they will never replace the mainstream clearnet, because blockchains are huge and bulky, and ever-growing.. but blockchains are there to stay nonetheless, and can still have a symbiotic relationship to the clearnet.
